title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

text: I’ve passed stones before but this last one was practically too big. It was so bad it landed me in the ER. Thought it was appendix. 10 days of excruciating pain and several thousand dollars later, I learn about this product from a friend who has had chronic issues with stones. I add drops to water every day. So far I haven’t had any additional issues with stones and am hoping this will keep it that way. It’s worked for her over the last year and in the past she’s had 3 a year.

When you've had kidney stones you'll try just about anything, and a nutritionist put me on this and I've never stopped since! text: This stuff is the best. 125 drops of Phosfood liquid taken with 50 drops of Stone Breaker (another wonderful fluid that comes in a one ounce bottle) for 7 straight days before a liver / gall bladder flush will soften the gall stones so they pass easily on the final day of the flush.
